### '`r basename(drug.dir)`'

```{r include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
cv.results.file <- Sys.glob(file.path(drug.dir, "*.cv.csv"))[1]
cv.results <- read.table(cv.results.file, sep = ",", header = TRUE)
cv.results['X'] <- NULL
cv.ctable <- xtabs(prop ~ prediciton + actual, data = cv.results)

# [i, j], i - prediction, j - actual
tp <- cv.ctable['1', '1']
fp <- cv.ctable['1', '0']
fn <- cv.ctable['0', '1']
tn <- cv.ctable['0', '0']
    
precission <- tp / (tp + fp) # real positives in all predicted positives
sensitivity <- tp / (tp + fn) # discovered positives from actual positives
```

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}
kable(cv.ctable)
```

Precission (actual positives in all predicted positives): `r precission`

Sensitivity (predicted positives from actual positives): `r sensitivity`
